channel.title: Gits on WNCBB's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gits on WNCBB's blog

item.title: Githug
item.description: 一个练习git的闯关小游戏 https://github.com/Gazler/githug gem install githug 执行命令 githug githug play

item.title: merge commit
item.description: cmd> git log --oneline # output: fe758f9 (HEAD -> master) add C 0aff9e3 add B 99c7474 add A 想要把B与C合并为一个commit: cmd> git rebase -i 99c7474 # output pick 0aff9e3 add B pick fe758f9 add C # 修改为: pick 0aff9e3 add B squash fe758f9 add C # 修改提交log为: add B, C cmd> git log # 现在的输出结果 commit b4fa4bc8e49cf8f529b078a94024bb55d99242ab (HEAD -> master) Author: zhanghaining.todd <zhanghaining.todd@bytedance.com> Date: Wed Feb 20 11:23:57 2019 +0800 add B,C commit 99c74744f72559b2f1cffcf250902df497bc8459 Author: zhanghaining.
